features.name: Charge
features.description: If the unicorn moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

features.name: Innate Spellcasting
features.description:
The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: 

At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace
1/day each: calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

features.name: Magic Resistance
features.description: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

features.name: Magic Weapons
features.description: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.description: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

actions.name: Teleport (1/Day)
actions.description: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 ft. of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.
